entry.def: The south is the direction which is on your right when you are looking towards the direction where the sun rises.

example.ex: The town lies ten miles to the south of here...
example.tran: 那个小镇位于这里以南 10 英里处。

example.ex: All around him, from east to west, north to south, the stars glittered in the heavens.
example.tran: 在他的四周，从东到西，从北向南，苍穹里到处繁星闪闪。

entry.def: The south of a place, country, or region is the part which is in the south.

example.tran: 在法国南部度过的假日

entry.def: If you go south, you travel towards the south.

example.ex: We did an extremely fast U-turn and shot south up the Boulevard St. Michel...
example.tran: 我们飞快地来了个 180 度的转弯，然后沿着圣米歇尔大道向南疾驰而去。

example.ex: He went south to climb Taishan, a mountain sacred to the Chinese.
example.tran: 他南下去爬泰山了，那是中国人心目中一座神圣的山。

entry.def: Something that is south of a place is positioned to the south of it.

example.ex: They now own and operate a farm 50 miles south of Rochester...
example.tran: 他们现在拥有并经营着一家位于罗切斯特以南 50 英里处的农场。

example.ex: I was living in a house just south of Market Street.
example.tran: 我就住在市场街南边的一座房子里。

entry.def: The south edge, corner, or part of a place or country is the part which is towards the south.

example.tran: 奥尔德尼岛的南部海岸

entry.def: 'South' is used in the names of some countries, states, and regions in the south of a larger area.
entry.tran: (用于国家、州或地区等的名称中)南部的

example.ex: Next week the President will visit five South American countries in six days.
example.tran: 总统将在下周的 6 天时间内访问南美洲的 5 个国家。

example.ex: ...the states of Mississippi and South Carolina.
example.tran: 密西西比州与南卡罗来纳州

entry.def: A south wind is a wind that blows from the south.
The South is used to refer to the poorer, less developed countries of the world.
entry.tran: 南方国家(指世界上较贫穷、欠发达的国家)

example.ex: The debate will pit the industrial North against developing countries in the South.
example.tran: 这次辩论会将形成北方工业国家与南方发展中国家针锋相对的局面。

means.word_mean: 1. the cardinal compass point that is at 180 degrees

sentences.cn: 西藏人口分布也很不均衡,多数人口集中在南部和东部.
sentences.en: The population is not evenly distributed with the majority concentrated in the south and east.

sentences.cn: 然而, 近年来, 葡萄园在英格兰南部的栽培已证明是成功的.

sentences.cn: 这次辩论会将形成北方工业国家与南方发展中国家针锋相对的局面。

sentences.cn: 但是那些危机还在南北之间 、 在工业化国家和发展中国家之间划了一道线.

sentences.en: The Antarctica treaty applies to all areas ( the high seas excepted ) below latitude 60 degrees south.

sentences.cn: 属于或关于紧邻北极圈以南的地区.

sentences.cn: 大多数是非洲撒哈拉以南的小朋友.

sentences.cn: 我们进入了向北而不是向南的高速公路.
sentences.en: We got onto the motorway going north instead of south.

sentences.cn: 朝南的超大阳台安装了窗帘.

sentences.cn: 来自南方的温暖和风吹干了街道。
sentences.en: Warm breezes from the South dried up the streets.

sentences.cn: 路通向南方.
sentences.en: The road tends south.

sentences.cn: 燕子在秋季开始向南方迁移.
sentences.en: Swallows begin their migration south in autumn.

sentences.cn: 阿米莉亚和弗雷德向南方的赤道飞去.
sentences.en: Amelia and Fred headed south toward the equator.

sentences.cn: 藉着对法令的范围向北方和向南方围起来.
sentences.en: Inclosed towards the north and south by ranges to the ordinance.

sentences.cn: 那只狗嚎叫起来,跑着穿过了草坪, 跑向南方, 铁匠工棚的方向.
sentences.en: Howling, the dog now raced away across the lawn, going South, toward the blacksmith sheds.

sentences.cn: 鸟儿飞向南方寻找温暖的阳光!
sentences.en: The birds flew south in search of warm sunshine!

sentences.cn: 从北半球看太阳, 你必须面向南方.
sentences.en: To watch the sun from the northern hemisphere, you have to face south.

sentences.cn: 飞机飞向南方.
sentences.en: The airplanes winged their way to the south.

sentences.en: A landslide has blocked off traffic moving south towards the motorway.

sentences.cn: 冬天来了,一只可爱的小鸟飞向南方.
sentences.en: A little bird was flying south for the winter.

sentences.cn: 她转向南方.
sentences.en: She turns toward the south.

sentences.cn: 公路在这渐次地弯向南方.
sentences.en: The highway swings south here.

sentences.cn: 重型卡车轰轰隆隆地沿着高速路驶向南方.
sentences.en: Heavy lorries thunder along highways to the south.

sentences.cn: 罗盘将会指向南方?
sentences.en: Will Compasses Point South?

sentences.cn: 陆地成脊背状延伸向南方.
sentences.en: The land ridges towards the South.

sentences.cn: 这条路从此处转向南方.
sentences.en: This road tends to the south here.

sentences.cn: 关于向南方旅游的古希腊人教授讲了什么?

sentences.cn: 海岸线从此处转向南方.

sentences.cn: 中国的罗盘总是指向南方!
sentences.en: Chinese compasses always point south!

sentences.en: As in your country, we grow wheat in the north and rice in the south.

sentences.en: She went to a special school and worked in several beauty shops in the south.

sentences.cn: 权衡一下, 我在南方应该比在北方更愉快.
sentences.en: Striking a balance, I should be happier in the south than in the north.
